line.text: Sweet love renew thy force be it not said
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy edge should blunter be than appetite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which but to-day by feeding is allayed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To-morrow sharpened in his former might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So love be thou although to-day thou fill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy hungry eyes even till they wink with fulness
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To-morrow see again and do not kill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The spirit of love with a perpetual dulness
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Let this sad interim like the ocean be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which parts the shore where two contracted new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Come daily to the banks that when they see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Return of love more blest may be the view
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or call it winter which being full of care
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Makes summer welcome thrice more wished more rare
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
